remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类，以指定基于 Windows 的应用程序使用客户端应用程序服务的网络连接。Use the class to specify the network connectivity of Windows-based applications that use client application services. 当你将设置属性`true`，客户端服务提供程序使用脱机缓存而不是尝试访问相应的 Web 服务。When you set the property to `true`, the client service providers use the offline cache instead of attempting to access the corresponding Web services. 脱机状态存储在每个用户和每个应用程序的基础上。The offline status is stored on a per-user and per-application basis. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：脱机使用客户端应用程序服务](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f792cb16-8520-4a0f-9dc9-07bfbc454e38)。For more information, see [How to: Work Offline with Client Application Services](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f792cb16-8520-4a0f-9dc9-07bfbc454e38). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类来更新脱机状态，具体取决于复选框值。The following example code demonstrates how to use this class to update the offline status depending on a check box value. 在此示例中，事件处理程序更新脱机状态。In this example, a event handler updates the offline status. 如果用户设置为联机状态应用程序，事件处理程序将尝试重新验证用户。If the user sets the application to the online state, the event handler attempts to revalidate the user. 但是，如果身份验证服务器不可用，事件处理程序将返回为脱机状态的应用程序。However, if the authentication server is unavailable, the event handler returns the application to the offline state. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将设置属性，类缓存到本地文件系统的值。When you set the property, the class caches the value to the local file system. 中的客户端服务提供商命名空间检查此值以确定是否使用脱机数据缓存而不是尝试访问关联[!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)]身份验证、 角色和配置文件服务。The client service providers in the namespace check this value to determine whether to use the offline data cache instead of attempting to access the associated [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)] authentication, roles, and profile services. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性来更新脱机状态，具体取决于复选框值。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property to update the offline status depending on a check box value. 在此示例中，事件处理程序更新脱机状态。In this example, a event handler updates the offline status. 如果用户设置为联机状态应用程序，事件处理程序将尝试重新验证用户。If the user sets the application to the online state, the event handler attempts to revalidate the user. 但是，如果身份验证服务器不可用，事件处理程序将返回为脱机状态的应用程序。However, if the authentication server is unavailable, the event handler returns the application to the offline state.
